name: Ronald Bien Jose
title: Full stack developer
introductions: Hello, and welcome! I'm a passionate software engineer with over a decade of experience as a software developer, dedicated to crafting clean and efficient web applications. My expertise focuses on creating responsive and dynamic user interfaces, leveraging the latest features and best practices of Angular.

I have a strong background in frontend and backend development, with a keen eye for design and a commitment to delivering high-quality, maintainable code. Whether it's building a new application from scratch or enhancing an existing one, I'm here to help bring your vision to life.

I'm well-versed in Angular's ecosystem, including RXJS for reactive programming, Angular Material for beautiful UI components, and bootstrap CSS/tailwind CSS framework for modern components and utilities.
Aside from building user interfaces, I'm also an experienced .NET backend developer for APIs and microservices, ensuring seamless communication between frontend and backend systems.
